posts.post_content:
Anybody got any in lower grade condition?  I am especially looking for Graham, Jones, Laporte, and Lang.  I am also interested in trading for T206 Sovereigns as well, but T205s have buying priority at the moment.  Let me know, and if you want to trade, shoot me your email so I can send you a list of what I have at the moment.

Take Care,
Geno

Still looking for Sovereigns, although my budget is limited right now, so prefer lesser condition or trade.

Take Care,
Geno
